website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas D Rose 7 is comfortable and delivers amazing traction. The full-length Boost is a hands-down favorite of most users. The shoe model is a certified performer on any court. It is also not an aesthetic failure. For its $140 price tag, it performs incredibly well. Buyers are hoping that when future signature releases, specifically the D Rose 10, it will be as good as 7th model.
pros: The materials that these D Rose basketball shoes are made of feel heavy on hand, but paradoxically feel light when worn
Plenty of purchasers agree that the shoe breaks in quickly and nicely
A good number of shoe owners praise the Boost in the Adidas D Rose 7
Wearers say that the shoe performs well on both indoor and outdoor courts
The padded inner walls of the shoe are appreciated by a lot of customers because they provide a good amount of ankle support
The outsole’s herringbone is praised by many users because it grips floors so well
For most buyers, these Adidas shoes look good not only on the court but also off it
According to a couple of testers, the torsional plate helps greatly with stability and support
The Adidas D Rose 7 is one of the best when it comes to flexibility, assert a reviewer
cons: A few users say that these Adidas basketball shoes are heavy and bulky
A handful say that the Adidas D Rose 7 has bad ankle support because there is too much padding
According to some owners, the shoe runs a bit short and feels narrow at the forefoot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent traction, nice look
customer_reviews.text: Excellent traction, nice look. Difficult to lockdown and tie them tight and comfortably. On a few hard cuts on the court I have mashed by big toe into the front of the shoe and it really hurts. Talking with Adidas about a possible return. Just can't get them tight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tttjjjsss

customer_reviews.title: which I love! I've got plantars fasciitis cuz my heel slips ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit narrow in the heel, which I love! I've got plantars fasciitis cuz my heel slips around in most shoes. Not these ones. Nice and snug on the heel and awesome traction etc. Best basketball shoes I've had, for narrow feet. Comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. He was surprised and the look on his face matched his words. He really liked them!! They are lightweight and the color is a true deep red. So far they are comfortable for him to wear all day. He did have 2 complaints, though: they were hard to get on and the laces don't stay tied. He still loves them despite the menial complaints.
customer_reviews.author: telling it like I see it.

customer_reviews.title: DRose 7 are Good
customer_reviews.text: This DRose shoe is better than the 5s and 6s. Very stylish and comfortable, thanks to the boost tech.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They're good for wide feet and give a lot of support from toe to ankle. I was worried that these were going to be all beat up since they were used, but I have been pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: KCFM888

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Normal fitment, fast shipping and authentic and great quality pair of shoes. I would bot hesitate to do repeat business here. I was happy they had my size and style i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: ALWAYS LOVE THE SNEAKER BUT A LITTLE TIGHT. GET A HALF SIZE TO SIZE BIGGER
customer_reviews.author: DONALD MIDGETTE

customer_reviews.title: incredible.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best basketball shoe I've ever worn. I'm officially converted to adidas and boost after playing in these.
customer_reviews.author: phillip recio

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my normal size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because of the high rating and I'm an Adidas fan. However, I was somewhat disappointed because the shoes were a little too big than the usual Adidas shoe. I didn't bother returning it.
customer_reviews.author: BrownBrady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality great looking and functioning basketball shoes. priced as all celebrity line Nikes are but are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zilberman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoe For A True Hooper
customer_reviews.text: these are the best shoes they've come out with for basketball in a long time. I feel like they run 1/2 1/4 size too big but they're an awesome shoe for the true hooper.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but they run a bit small & ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them, but they run a bit small & toe box is a bit narrow. It is just hard to buy shoes online.
customer_reviews.author: william wright

customer_reviews.title: Wear this shoes u become D Rose lor!
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes and I wear Nike US9M fit as expected also this shoes ~
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: I love my new shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my new shoes... They are light and comfortable :) The only thing I hate is it is a little hard to put them on...
customer_reviews.author: Shayan

customer_reviews.title: The ankle support is GREAT on this Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe to play in! Great ankle support and not to heavy. I've bought 3 pair of these all in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Ant Robinson

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY. PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: This shoe could not be any better. I use it for indoor batting practice as well, or BP outdoors on any smooth, synthetic surface. JOB WELL DONE ALL AROUND.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dave

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes felt good when first tried on but when worn for practice they were pinching the toes and felt as if something was causing it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe! Felt better after I broke it in. Adidas is making some good moves!
customer_reviews.author: BBuilder08

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pair of ball shoes i owned.
customer_reviews.author: samip

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these shoes and they are exactly what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these shoes and they are exactly what I wanted, the traction is amazing and they also look beautiful, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes length was perfect they were wide in the heal. Worked up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Stout

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son for Christmas and he loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: if both shoes fit properly...i would have kept these.
customer_reviews.text: aside from one shoe not fitting properly...these seemed to be a good shoe. the shoes were returned and the performance of the shoe was not evaluated for the reason mentioned earlier with one of the shoes. that's my only concern with buying shoes online, the inability to put the shoe on before purchasing. anyway...i was given a refund (not sure if they deducted shipping from my return or not, which is another thing to be aware of when purchasing shoes online).
customer_reviews.author: moseff

customer_reviews.title: Nice b-ball shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I really love how these shows look, with the exception of one small detail. On the heels there are these thin white cloth hoops, I suppose for hanging or pulling on when taking on and off. But they are so thin II feel like they'll rip right off, and one is slightly bigger than the other. I think the shoe looks amazing without them, and I'm not sure why they decided to add it. I plan to cut them off with a razor blade. Also, the shoe is fairly narrow. The length and size fits good, but the width is a little tight. They sure do look nice though. Will be great for b-ball.
customer_reviews.author: John Mosc

customer_reviews.title: This one was great, quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. As his feet have grown borderline beyond common commercial stock sizes we have no other option but to order specialty sport shows online. I, myself, Ι am always skeptic when buying shoes online as most of the times you simply throw a dice on them as per how it turns out when coming out of the box and/or/ how it fits. This one was great, quality shoe, 100% as expected a fit, and my son had already given it a five star himself!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Kontopodi

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes but they are kind of tight around ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but they are kind of tight around the middle of my foot. I have to replace the soles in the show which made a Big difference if you are flat footed and have arch feet like I do. Overall the shoe looks great and feels great on the basketball court. I would not recommend playing basketball or doing any sports activity in these shows because the grip will deteriorate because it is like a gel.
customer_reviews.author: Lost

customer_reviews.title: Nice basketball shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shoes, true size and they are incredible comfortable. They arrived sooner than expected and they look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maryury Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best basketball shoe for bigger men (forwards/centers) looking for impact ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best basketball shoe for bigger men (forwards/centers) looking for impact protection, traction and support. The shoe is on the bulky side and wt. is 17.7 oz for a size 11.5. The only negative side is the fit. Heel and midfoot is decent for wide footers but the forefoot has too much space and unfomfortable for the toes as a result. Cushion = 10 Traction = 10 Support = 9 Fit = 7
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Enriquez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball shoes. Broke in pretty quickly and have great support and traction. I usually wear an 11.5 but went with the 12 in these. Fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, and pretty good looking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Initial hands-on impression was a surprisingly super-high quality, very, very comfortable, and pretty good looking sneaker. Unfortunately it runs very large so had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Dont Fear The Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son plays basketball in these shoes and he loves them. He says they give him the traction and support he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Bee+4

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend and he loves them. Says they fit as expected and look incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Bang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, great price, fantastic for out of the box and straight to the court, just...perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T. Steenson

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loved them so much that he tried them on as ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved them so much that he tried them on as soon as they got here and didn't take them off until we went to bed!😂 He said they're so SICK and are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Will have a better idea in z couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying these. Will have a better idea in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lilin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe. Runs a little small.
customer_reviews.text: Really solid shoe. Just a bit tighter than the last few models on the ankle. Might go one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: ok, but not great!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good, but I believe that the insoles are a cheaper version (not the same as D Rose wares). To the manufacturer or Amazon: please do not try to save money from doing this to customers!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Leigh

product_meta.title: Adidas Men's D Rose 7 Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Bring dynamic game to your play in the adidas D Rose 7 basketball sneaker..
feature_bullets: boost's energy-returning properties keep every step charged with an endless supply of light, fast energy
Engineered mesh and synthetic upper provides maximum breathability; Synthetic overlays provide strategic support
Molded collar offers support and works well with a brace; Minimalist and lightweight design
